content: Is there a reason why Cargo's CI doesn't run tests on Linux x86_64? At least from what I can tell of https://github.com/rust-lang/cargo/blob/e1fb17631eb1b3665cdbe45b1c186111577ef512/.github/workflows/main.yml#L35
Also, should tests be run on aarch64 as well?
It arguably feels like all the tests that currently set i686 should really be x86_64, and then we should just have _one_ target that tests i686?
